DOC.brief_summary: This open label , randomize , three-period crossover study evaluate effect co-administration Tamiflu ( oseltamivir ) rimantadine pharmacokinetics Tamiflu rimantadine . Healthy volunteer receive multiple oral dos Tamiflu , rimantadine Tamiflu plus rimantadine random order , minimum wash-out period 7 day treatment . Anticipated time study 11 week .
DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic Study Co-administration Tamiflu ( Oseltamivir ) Rimantadine Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Adults , age 18 45 year Healthy judge general physical examination , medical history , vital sign , 12lead ECG laboratory test Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 1834 kg/m2 Willing participate trial include investigational drug 3 month follow last dose Male subject must agree use barrier contraception study 3 month discontinuation treatment Female subject nonchild bear potential effective contraception either postmenopausal , surgically sterile , agree use barrier contraception whole study addition intrauterine device hormonal contraception least 3 month prior 1st dose , study 3 month discontinuation treatment History current clinically significant disease disorder Positive Hepatitis B , Hepatitis C , HIV 1 2 test result Positive pregnancy test lactate woman Clinically relevant history allergy hypersensitivity Clinically relevant history abuse alcohol drug ; tobacco smoking allow ( < /= 10 cigarette day equivalent tobacco cigar pipe ) Any major illness within 30 day prior screen examination Administration medication 7 day prior drug administration , except paracetamol aspirin ( 48 hour first dose ) oral contraceptive Participation clinical study investigational drug within 3 month prior study day 1 Donation loss 500 mL blood within 3 month prior study day 1
